overview: This is a special made by WGN-9 Chicago to tie in with the release of Twilight Zone: The Movie. Hosted by Carol Serling (Rod's window), it features the three episodes of the original series that were adapted into the movie: Kick the Can, It's a Good Life and Nightmare at 20,000 Feet. There is also some behind the scenes footage from the filming of the movie including brief interviews with the directors.
title: Journey Into the Twilight Zone
